title: AI Agents & Automation
description: Explore autonomous AI agents and multi-agent systems

nodes.label: AI Agents
nodes.description: Autonomous AI systems that perceive, reason, and take actions to achieve goals

nodes.label: Core Concepts
nodes.description: Fundamental agent concepts

nodes.label: Reasoning
nodes.description: How agents plan and make decisions

nodes.label: ReAct Pattern
nodes.description: Reason + Act: Think step-by-step, then take action, observe result, repeat

nodes.label: Chain of Thought
nodes.description: Break complex problems into step-by-step reasoning

nodes.label: Memory
nodes.description: How agents retain and recall information

nodes.label: Short-term Memory
nodes.description: In-context conversation history (limited by context window)

nodes.label: Long-term Memory
nodes.description: Vector store for persistent knowledge retrieval

nodes.label: Tool Use
nodes.description: Agents using external tools

nodes.label: Function Calling
nodes.description: LLM outputs structured JSON to invoke functions

nodes.label: Web Browsing
nodes.description: Search and retrieve information from the web

nodes.label: Code Execution
nodes.description: Run Python/JS code in sandboxed environment

nodes.label: API Calls
nodes.description: Integrate with external services via REST APIs

nodes.label: File Operations
nodes.description: Read, write, and manipulate files

nodes.label: Agent Frameworks
nodes.description: Tools for building agents

nodes.label: LangChain Agents
nodes.description: Flexible agent abstractions with tools and memory

nodes.label: AutoGen
nodes.description: Microsoft's multi-agent conversation framework

nodes.label: CrewAI
nodes.description: Role-based agents working as a crew

nodes.label: AutoGPT
nodes.description: Fully autonomous GPT-4 agent

nodes.label: OpenAI Assistants
nodes.description: Managed agent API with tools and retrieval

nodes.label: Multi-Agent Systems
nodes.description: Multiple agents working together

nodes.label: Orchestration
nodes.description: Coordinating multiple agents for complex tasks

nodes.label: Task Delegation
nodes.description: Breaking tasks and assigning to specialist agents

nodes.label: Agent Collaboration
nodes.description: Agents communicating and working together

nodes.label: Design Patterns
nodes.description: Common agent architectures

nodes.label: Plan & Execute
nodes.description: Create plan upfront, then execute steps

nodes.label: Self-Reflection
nodes.description: Agent evaluates and improves its own output

nodes.label: Supervisor Pattern
nodes.description: Manager agent routes to specialist workers
